text: Michael "Mick" Russell (born 23 June 1962) is a Scottish amateur football referee who officiates in all four leagues of the Football League having made his debut as a referee in 2001. He represents Hertfordshire FA. In March 2015, he refereed the 2015 Football League Trophy Final at Wembley between Bristol City and Walsall ==References== ==External links== * * * Category:1965 births Category:Living people Category:English football referees Category:English Football League referees Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Mick Russell
